title: A Christmas Carol (Part 7)
description: Scrooge and the Ghost of Christmas Present continue on their journey and witness many scenes of celebration and joy. They visit the home of Scrooge's nephew, where they witness a holiday party filled with fun and games, but Scrooge discovers that his misery has made him the butt of their jokes. Later, the ghost reveals a sickly boy and girl hidden under his robe and explains that they represent Ignorance and Want. Then, he vanishes and is replaced by an ominous hooded phantom.
